resources.string: The password must never contain the same letter more than once!
The password must only contain letters! No special characters!

Code Cracker is a spare time project that I have been working on, for educational purposes. It is the first Android application that I have created. 

The idea with the app is to be able to read and write various types of codes, such as Morse code, number codes, and a few other types. 

This is an early version of the app, and therefore there are still a lot of details that are not completely finished. An example of this is that the tables on the various code types are not dynamic, but a default table is shown.
